summary: **Stray** is a 2022 video game where you play as a cat stuck in a city full of robots and weird bacteria. With the help of a drone named B-12, you jump, climb, and solve puzzles to escape. The game is inspired by real cats and the look of old, crowded cities. It got mostly good reviews and won some awards. People liked the unique idea, pretty graphics, and fun cat movements. The game is on PlayStation, Windows, and will come to Xbox and Nintendo Switch soon.
title: Stray (video game)
